title: Zot Defence
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

**Zot Defence** is a tower-defense-styled variation on [Dungeon Crawl](/Dungeon_Crawl "Dungeon Crawl"). After selecting one of the five available scenarios and character to play as, you are placed on a map and tasked with defending the [Orb of Zot](/Orb_of_Zot "Orb of Zot") from all threats. Monsters will be generated in waves, swarming in from the upstairs. You must prevent the monsters from reaching the [Orb of Zot](/Orb_of_Zot "Orb of Zot"), which you may not pick up or apport.

During each turn in which a hostile monster stands over the Orb, you suffer one point of [rot](/Rot "Rot") damage. Each time you go up one [experience](/Experience "Experience") level, you receive a new special "Zot Ability" which will aid you in protecting the Orb; the use of these abilities expends Zot Points, which are gained concurrently with experience.

The waves of monsters grow in strength over time; at the end of each wave, an out-of-depth "boss" monster is generated. Every few waves, a [rune](/Rune "Rune") is generated on the stairs along with the boss monster. You may pick up the Orb, and leave the dungeon with it, if you are carrying fifteen runes.
